```
      aws ec2 run-instances \
    --image-id $AMI \
    --instance-type t2.micro \
    --user-data file://agents.sh \
    --iam-instance-profile 'Name=CW_SSM' \
    --tag-specifications 'ResourceType=instance,Tags=[{Key=Name,Value=Ubuntu},{Key=Inspector,Value=TRUE}]' \
    --region us-east-2
    ```
